website_summaries.verdict: This 10-pack of standard duplex outlets allows homeowners to replace multiple outlets at once. Nice faceplate styling.
pros: Buyers like the easy installation and modern look of the faceplate
cons: Product isn’t tamper resistant, which remodelers in certain states need to be aware of due to building codes

customer_reviews.title: Used items, beware of the risks.
customer_reviews.text: Each of the three outlets I received were used despite the product description saying they would be new. This is potentially dangerous and not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaberham

customer_reviews.title: Sticker on face of outlet :(
customer_reviews.text: Outlet itself was fine, worked as expected. Unfortunate that I had to spend so much time scrubbing the residue of the inventory sticker that was slapped directly on the FACE of the outlet. Please either put the sticker on the back or use stickers that don’t leave glue behind.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Order the right outlets
customer_reviews.text: Note these are 15 amp outlets. The holes on the back are sized for #14 wire such as white romex. The yellow romex #12 or orange #10 used for 20 amp circuits will not fit the holes but will fit under the side screws but why would you ever use an underrated outlet? Also note bathrooms and basements require 20 amp circuits. So use these in all the other rooms of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you are looking for, QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for good quality decora style outlets, then these are the right o es to buy. They are well constructed, easy to install, and will outlast most people if properly installed. The packaging is excellent and clearly identifies the product within. These make a great upgrade for older outlets, but they will require a decora style cover plate, so dont forget to order those as well. The product arrived sooner than expected and I installed many of them over the last month.
customer_reviews.author: Bongu

customer_reviews.title: Leviton is the only choice compared to Enerlites
customer_reviews.text: I started out with 50 enerlites and removed them halfway through. Started over with Leviton and they meet my wishes. The color was true to the plug or switch. The electrical plugs have quick releases in the back and there is no unsightly tab on the top of the wall plate. All the products in the Leviton family matched colorwise which is something that the Enerlites did not manages. I wish the Leviton wallplate was a big and the Enerlites but not enough to make a buying decision in the least. No comparison in my view.
customer_reviews.author: Al in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Nice, non backstab, non "tamper proof" receptacles.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. I bought them to use as the regular outlets (NOT the appliance outlets as those are 20A) in my kitchen (kitchen has a GFCI breaker so a GFCI outlet is not needed.) These receptacles look good and are not the annoying tamper resistant plugs that everyone seems to be so fond of now. These are also not backstab outlets which is a plus. I really dislike backstab receptacles. These were just like any other outlets I've ever installed before, and all 10 of them work.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Amazon’s product picture outdated
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new outlet to fit in a new wall plate that I purchased. The outlet has the brand printed on it, which is bothersome to me. The photo provided by amazon when I purchased it didn’t have the brand “Leviton” printed on the outlet. The product would have been given 5 stars for accurate advertising.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: BRANDED!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: This product was silently changed with no change in the packaging or product number (5325-WMP). The new version of the product (left) has the brand emblazoned on the front of the product so you can provide free advertising for them for life. I specifically bought these because they didn't have that crap in the pictures. Really disappointing move.
customer_reviews.author: 7d7h338982gge

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks clean.
customer_reviews.text: Installs super fast to update the look of outlets, no issues with plugs at all so far and over 30 installed.
customer_reviews.author: Neverfast

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all, it looks great and very easy to install. There are instructions that come with it, to help you install it properly. #1 rule, always turn off power to receptacle first. We replaced our receptacles that are over 30 years old in this home we bought. What a difference in look and function. They look amazing and we are happy with it. We are using Leviton Wallplates with it and it looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garza III

customer_reviews.title: The bulk price was great and the units have the solid Leviton quality
customer_reviews.text: Recently replaced the old style outlets in my home with these Leviton 5325-WMP Decor outlets. The bulk price was great and the units have the solid Leviton quality. Easy to replace/install and appliace plugs slide in and out of the new outlets smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Tor Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pics - (wall plate sold seperately?)
customer_reviews.text: ...really? This seller can't provide a simple wall plate? Then why SHOW the wallplate in your pictures!? "sold separately" - While the unit itself is ok, i'd warn others to find another seller with common sense. btw, wallplate sold separately is at the bottom of this products details. So like with everything else, read products descriptions carefully, not if one is in a hurry . - .
customer_reviews.author: WiLL

customer_reviews.title: Great price when purchasing in bulk
customer_reviews.text: The previous owner of my house had plastic security plugs plugged into all of the outlets causing the contacts to spread and become loose. Anything I would plug in wouldn't stay plugged in securely. To remedy this, I swapped out all of my older circular outlets for these newer Leviton decora style outlets and haven't had any issues with the 35+ pieces that installed.
customer_reviews.author: Chu

customer_reviews.title: Quick connectors too small for most homes
customer_reviews.text: Does your house have high quality wiring? If so then don't use these outlets, the quick connectors only work up to 14 gauge. most houses I work on are 12 gauge. This more then double the time to wire up each of these outlets.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Basic outlets for a descent price.
customer_reviews.text: Changed our outlets to the decora style. Install was easy and the 10 pack was relatively inexpensive way to transition to the decora style.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Porgie

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: The outlet is made in the USA. Compared to cheaper foreign competition I'll take this unit everyday. The quality of the parts, and finish of the unit is excellent. Why would you install an inferior outlet risking the liability when this better alternative is available?
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: I have installed 30+ of these throughout my house so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have installed 30+ of these throughout my house so far. I will continue to use them until all outlets have been replaced and match
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: "Residential" does not necessarily mean legal: many locales require tamper-resistant outlets only.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with these except my electrician refused to install them. In Massachusetts and many other places, only tamper-resistant outlets are allowed for new construction of any residence (because there are or might be children, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: ChuckFBG

customer_reviews.title: Review unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to install this then you’re familiar with this product. If you need a review then your lack of knowledge should preclude you from installing any line voltage electric device as it is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL. RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: My house had two prong outlets and I needed a three prong outlet. I bought this outlet for my TV and stereo. So far it has worked well. We use the TV everyday. An electrician came and made the swap out. Works well and looks good. I would recommend these to friends or family members.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE A. DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: The replacement from a very old outlet was a little difficult because of the age of the original outlet and original installation, but once it was finally installed it was easy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Scocozzo

customer_reviews.title: You Better make sure your general contractor completes install before return window closes
customer_reviews.text: Nothin wrong with the oprofuct per se. We decided to install the plug that includes the built in USB charger slot. By the time we figured that out ( a function of contractor speed), we had exceeded the return window, bummer
customer_reviews.author: Randy E. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Better looking than standard outlets
customer_reviews.text: I put a few of these to dress up my outlets in my new home and it does dress it up and make it match the light switches already installed and all of my data I am currently installing and cleans up the look.
customer_reviews.author: Wigglebutt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & modern update to the home!
customer_reviews.text: Looks & works great! We updated our new (to us) home with these throughout the entire house & retired & donated the old tired ones from a couple of decades ago. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rudokas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: To be honest we love Leviton products. Hate shopping in hardware stores where we cannot get help. Exactly what we wanted without the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, used for replacement from the old circular style plugs
customer_reviews.author: Demond A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: WOW - Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price and identical to those in the stores... less than half the price of store.. I will buy again. Happy Camper ... Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Craig F

customer_reviews.title: Simple and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Updated our livingroom wall outlets for a more contemporary look. They were easy to install and looked and worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Espi Arispe

customer_reviews.title: THE TEN COUNT PACKAGE IS A GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Decora Duplex Receptacles LOOK GREAT AND WORK WELL......THEY ARE THEY ONLY ONES THAT I BUY FOR YEARS!!...A WELL PRICED, AND REAL QUALITY ELECTRICAL OUTLET.......THE DECORA MODERN LOOK BEATS 'EM ALL!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value!! Arrived so fast I couldn't believe it!! Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, I would not buy again. Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Giving 1 star because I have to in order to leave a review. They came without packaging lose in a box and looked as if they were used and returned.Items were described as new. Outlet faces were dirty and scratched missing 1 mounting screw. If they were not intended for the garage I would have sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: tony arnold

customer_reviews.title: Well made basic outlet for a great price. I prefer the clamp style terminals and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made basic outlet for a great price. I prefer the clamp style terminals and these only have the set screw which means bending wires around and jamming them in. Not a huge pain but the clamps make it significantly easier. There is no tamper resistance which means plugs go in nice and easy even on my ancient steel bodied power tools with weak prongs. Good budget product.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install receptacle
customer_reviews.text: I used the receptacle to extend power behind my tv. It was easy to connect/install. Looks solid n durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sudeep

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Office replace the old ones in my house these one looks a lot better than those other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: It's an outlet it is as expected. The only ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an outlet it is as expected. The only minor inconvenience is that the slid in connection point only takes 14 AWG wire. My circuit uses 12 AWG so I had to wrap the wire around the screw. Again very minor.
customer_reviews.author: David Garey

customer_reviews.title: Work great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Work great, easy to install. Updating our light switches and electrical outlets made a big aesthetic improvement when updating our home.
customer_reviews.author: AWMIATTY

customer_reviews.title: Multiple colors available
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know this Gray color was available, looks great in our newly remodeled bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Dwight M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Outlets
customer_reviews.text: Outlets worked as expected. They are simple to install, they look good, and they are reasonably priced. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tbrundrummer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth action
customer_reviews.text: I love how smooth these accept a plug. They hold great and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morning

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest I've came across compared to Walmart, Home Depot, and Lowes. Does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Order so much the mailman hates us

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot better than the traditional D-shaped because ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot better than the traditional D-shaped because they seem tougher, and less likely to break out the plastic bit below the ground connector. Holding up great so far in my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: David Robins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exact item I needed and arrived on time. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Only the best.
customer_reviews.text: Leviton is quality in almost everything I have ever used. No exceptions here.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: These have a cheap look and feel. They are a bit shiny and I was a expecting a more matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: phasegirl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Has leviton in raised lettering on the face of every outlet. Unless of course you want to advertise for leviton for the next 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leviton 5325-S 15 Amp, 125 Volt, Decora Duplex Receptacle, Residential Grade, Self Grounding, Mahogany
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Leviton 5325-S 15 Amp, 125 Volt, Decora Duplex Receptacle, Residential Grade, Self Grounding, Mahogany to us outside in a box with a weather proof cover. It is visible from outside the cover as it is clear. I went to the dark brown color, to avoid having the moisture and mold in our area discoloring a light receptacle. It is solid and is as good a receptacle as I have used.
customer_reviews.author: CDP's Onceagain habit of purchasingTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Good Performance, Great Design
customer_reviews.text: This is a true bang for your buck! replaced 7 total outlets in a room and they perform better than before, of course time will tell if these are true quality but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Only down side is how hard it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Only down side is how hard it is to plug things into is sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason White

customer_reviews.title: Great outlets, but they don't have backwire capability
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the quality of these outlets, but I wish they had backwire capability.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: All decora outlets installed easily. Breakaway tabs to allow switched outlets were easy to remove. Expect they’ll last several years with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Norman Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great outlets
customer_reviews.text: The pack of 10 receptacles is a great deal... each receptacle is less than $2 each. Delivery was quicker than I expected. And of course, Leviton is one of the top switch manufacturers in the USA. The Leviton Decora's make a quick and simple transformation for updating switches and receptacles and cover plates. A great home improvement for a modest price. Quite easy to do (MAKE CERTAIN YOU TURN OFF THE POWER AT THE CIRCUIT BREAKER) and perhaps watch a few good Youtube instructional videos on how to replace receptacles. If in doubt, call a certified electrician!
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product from Lutron. Working on changing all 30 year old switches and plaugs in our home. Lutron is our first choice. As a contractor one of the brand's I trust to go into clients homes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap quality. First one I tried to install, ground screw was stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected. I used these during my remodel ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. I used these during my remodel with Lutron screwless covers to create a clean modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T.Top Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: Good recepticle, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, easy to use. The push in clamps on the back only accept 14awg solid. I would have preferred the type that clamp on when screwed, but it is not too incovenient to make loops.
customer_reviews.author: FriagramTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised in pictures
customer_reviews.text: The outlets don't quite match the pictures. They have a little "Leviton" inscribed in the corner on the front. Get your branding out of my house. Its an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Aram A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great Replacement. We are remodeling an older home where there were no matching receptacles. These are a quick installation, fit snug and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graham

customer_reviews.title: A classic plug
customer_reviews.text: I've used these Leviton plugs all over my house, and they have been excellent. They have a good solid feel, without being too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Camp RunamokTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better price then the big box stores
customer_reviews.text: Great product , better price then the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jchan

customer_reviews.title: and it works just fine. I picked this up to swap out some ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say - it's a outlet, and it works just fine. I picked this up to swap out some older style outlets so that they would match my new decora z-wave light switches.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent receptacle!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent receptacle. This replaced a receptacle in a kitchen island, using a wooden plate. The Decora geometry was preferable to the more standard duplex.
customer_reviews.author: Knoble

customer_reviews.title: Original leviton
customer_reviews.text: Original equipment with Leviton name stamped on the metal plate
customer_reviews.author: bobm

customer_reviews.title: Not white white and doesnt match
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as white but doesnt match Leviton white decora plate. These have a yellow tint.
customer_reviews.author: LA Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Clean, quality and modern outlets
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice clean and modern look. Always like the products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: CSJonesGate

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than stores and everyone worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I swapped out around 20 cream ones for white. Everyone worked perfectly and was a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: beckles

customer_reviews.title: Very good price, too
customer_reviews.text: You're not going to go wrong with Leviton. Very good price, too. Always buy more then one. You will need it, eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Power Tool Marine

customer_reviews.title: Not Tamper Resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Could have been my mistake but code requires TR outlets in my area... these aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Knopic

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: have to install. slight more brown than photo but happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Good quality outlets.
customer_reviews.text: You can get outlets for less, but the quality just isn't there. Spend a couple dollars more and get good ones. That would be these.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. High Quality. Gray matched color in glass tiles perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find the almond color at the home box stores without special order. Much easier here and better price. Color goes well with beige paint.

customer_reviews.title: Works well. The only reason I bought them on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The only reason I bought them on Amazon was because I had a bunch of gift cards to burn.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: No ugly white "shutters"....
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a black outlet without those ugly white socket "shutters"--but this is it!
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern looking outlet.
customer_reviews.text: For an electric outlet, these are very nice looking. One thing we learned as DIY's, you are supposed to install them so the holes look like a face. Slots being eyes and the mouth below. : ) Works the other way, but all the plugs then have to be inserted upside down and sometimes that creates a problem with the fixture you are plugging in as it will be upside down. These are well made and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: MyWord

customer_reviews.title: The items were great, just as described
customer_reviews.text: The items were great, just as described. Zero stars for the way Amazon packaged them, but they made it right in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great - needed brown to replace an outlet that no longer worked. glad to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Nita L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have been easy to work with, safe and stylish. The price was right as well.
customer_reviews.author: The_cow_goes_NAY

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good built quality and materials! The product looks just like the one advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MOREIRA P.

customer_reviews.title: regular switch at a good price...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special just average switch... but not be fooled my friend this days when things are below average..... it is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sion

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to change out ugly duplex outlets the price was great and each out went in with no problem

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's a Leviton Decora duplex outlet. Pretty basic stuff, but Leviton makes good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Franks

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking outlets
customer_reviews.text: We used these outlets in our remodeled master bedroom. They work well and I have not had any issues with them.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what you buy it to do. Also no Tamper Proof inserts which are so good at forcing the plug out.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Barker

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: This outlet was easy to install and gives the room a more modern look than the oval outlets from the 70s.
customer_reviews.author: UBL

customer_reviews.title: Decorative wall outlet
customer_reviews.text: Same exact outlet as the box stores provide but at a slightly better price. I you can stand the 3 day wait more than likely you can get the bust price here

customer_reviews.title: Nice to find colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice to find a gray that matches our tile backsplash
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot to say about this one
customer_reviews.text: They do appear to be new, however the packaging had been opened, and then a half hearted attempt to reseal it.
customer_reviews.author: Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Find cheaper at Home Depot. 10 for $15. Don't overpay.
customer_reviews.author: F Joseph

customer_reviews.title: this is a great option along with the switch plates from Lutron
customer_reviews.text: It's an outlet. It complies with all of the necessary electrical standards that it needs to . I'm typing this to get to the minimum number of characters! It's grey in color. Seriously, if you (like me) are done with white outlets everywhere, this is a great option along with the switch plates from Lutron. Tip: Buy these outlets rather than the equivalent Lutron outlet and save about 40%.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Where Are Corresponding Finish Cover Plates?
customer_reviews.text: The receptacles are fine, however I can't find wall plates to match the finish. You can't just say, "white". The finish on these is flat or eggshell. But where are the wall plates with that finish? I only find glossy. Come on. February 14th update: Knocked it down to two stars. The dealer has not contacted me about the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wordy

customer_reviews.title: Not a great choice for a busy outlet
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with these at all. Outlet sockets make a crunch sound and require a wiggle to "pop" your plug past whatever is jamming up the outlet. Outlet covers are larger and not centered properly so you'll have some gaps. For a name brand product these are really poorly made and I'd return them if it was worth my time
customer_reviews.author: Cylon6

customer_reviews.title: world class customer service
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, world class customer service, would recommend and use again
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust toi color in the image. If it appears WHITE, it might be GRAY. Read every word.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a WHITE device (as pictured) but the Part Number read "GY" and the Seller was impossible to work with. Tried to make me feel like an idiot - all over a few-dollar item. It's the seller that is bad - not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper - Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Modern, very lineal look! Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and I am no electrician. Like any outlet, you always have to be careful you install the wiring the same as the ones you removed. Safety first, so always cut the power before working on an outlet. These flat outlets are very classy looking, and fit the open-faced face-plates that we bought. Brings a very modern, lineal look to the room which is what we were after
customer_reviews.author: Dorene Simons

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grip the plug very firmly
customer_reviews.text: After going through the trouble of replacing an old worn out outlet I was rather disappointed that this new outlet doesn't grip the plug very strongly. If the outlet is used infrequently this is probably ok, but I suspect these will wear out quickly if they are used often. The Leviton tamper resistant outlet (no. T5325) does a better job. Maybe I'll try Lutron next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Good product - but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Good product - but over priced. Too expensive to return. Purchased 10-pack at big box store of exact product for much less!
customer_reviews.author: CynCyn

customer_reviews.title: Buy these from a seller other than Amazon
customer_reviews.text: In your local big box store these come in individual boxes, but Amazon must get them from bulk stock. The ones from Amazon come unprotected and with scratched faces which makes them unsuitable for use anywhere that appearance matters ... and why would you buy the Decora style receptacles except for appearance.
customer_reviews.author: upset

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To Do
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for an A/V installation for a wall mounted TV that also used a Leviton Quickport next to it. Perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Spoon

customer_reviews.title: it's a black outlet!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with all my black outlet accents! Just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Kate A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacking, these do NOT hold up against
customer_reviews.text: Moderate to heavy usage, two stars because they worked, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

product_meta.title: Leviton 5325-WMP 15 Amp, 125 Volt, Decora Duplex Receptacle, Residential Grade, Grounding, 10-Pack, White
product_meta.description:
Color:AmazonUs/LEVV9| Size:10 countLeviton's comprehensive Residential Grade Receptacles portfolio includes devices rated for all residential applications in a variety of standard configurations. They are produced in an array of colors in both Decora (R) and traditional styles. The Decora duplex receptacle is designed for a chic appearance, quick installation and durability. Its impact-resistant thermoplastic design allows for a long service life and high performance in Homes, offices, schools and other settings. The duplex coordinates beautifully with the complete line of Leviton's Decora devices.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Decora rocker switch is a single pole ,non-grounding switch. It features quickwire push-in and side wired capability. Thermoplastic actuator and body material and steel strap material. UL and CSA standards and certifications. 2 year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Designed with thermoplastic construction and feature a shallow build for maximum wiring room
Equipped with break-off plaster ears and tabs to allow for easy alignment and two-circuit conversion.
Double-wipe power contacts for reliable conductivity and plug retention
Terminal screws accept up to No.12 AWG cooper or copper-clad wire
Quick wire push-in terminals accept no.14 AWG solid cooper wire only
Double-wipe power contacts for reliable conductivity and plug retention
